champ_0050_rival_02:
How’s the Gym journey? Which one are you
going for now?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0050_rival_03:
Wait, seriously? I’m close by! Hang on, I’ll come
say hi.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0050_rival_05:
Look at you with two Gym Badges already.
Awesome![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0050_rival_06:
And this is the Gym you chose to be number
three, huh?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0050_rival_07:
Well, you’re up to the challenge for sure!
But, like, just to be safe...[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0050_rival_08:
you probably better have a pre-Gym warm-up
battle with me![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0050_rival_10:
I reeeally think you’ll be glad you had some
practice. This Gym Leader’s tough![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0050_rival_12: C’mon, the field of battle awaits![VAR 0114(0004)]
